title: Fix Template Loading to Include revision_summary Field

comment: DEFICIENCY: Section 2.1 contains corrupted text encoding. The phrase 'incomplete frontmatterï¿½the' contains a garbled character (likely an em-dash that was incorrectly encoded). This must be corrected before approval. Suggested fix: Replace with 'incomplete frontmatter - the' or 'incomplete frontmatter: the'.

COMPLIANT. Verified: (1) Frontmatter complete - title: 'Fix Template Loading to Include revision_summary Field', revision_summary: 'INV-004-CAPA-001: Fix missing revision_summary in template loading'; (2) All 12 required CR sections present per SOP-002 Section 6; (3) No prohibited placeholders (TBD, TODO, FIXME, XXX); (4) Character encoding issue from previous round corrected - no em-dash in Section 2.1; (5) Traceability established to parent INV-004-CAPA-001; (6) No typos or formatting errors. Document ready for pre-approval.

NON-COMPLIANT: Placeholder content found in Execution Comments table (line 153-154). The row contains '[COMMENT] | [PERFORMER] - [DATE]' which is template placeholder text. Either remove the placeholder row or replace with actual content (e.g., 'No comments' or 'N/A'). All other sections verified compliant: frontmatter title='Fix Template Loading to Include revision_summary Field', revision_summary='INV-004-CAPA-001: Fix missing revision_summary in template loading'.
